All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
This class represents the board where the character moves
BoardGenerator
The BoardGenerator class is responsible for generating a random board.
Cell
This class represents a tile on the board
Character
This class represent the base of a character that the player will play with.
ConsoleColors
This class is a tool to change the color displayed in the console
DatabaseConnector
Utility class that contains all the methods to interact with the database
DefensiveBonusCell
This class represents a tile where a defensive equipment can be found
DefensiveEquipment
This class represent defensive equipment that can be given to a character
Dice
This class represent a dice that the player can roll to play.
Dragon
represents a dragon that can be encountered on the board
EmptyCell
This class represents an empty tile on the board, that makes nothing when a character reaches it
Enemy
Represent an enemy that can be encountered on the board
EnemyCell
This class represents a tile where an enemy can be found
Game
This class implements all the game logic
GameLogger
This class is the logger created to display the messages.
Gobelin
represents a gobelin that can be encountered on the board
GuiMain
Ths class is the entry point for the graphic version
Magician
This class represents a specific character that the player can choose to play with.
Main
 
Menu
This class implements all the methods to allow the player to read instructions and give his choices
OffensiveBonusCell
This class represents a tile where an offensive equipment can be found
OffensiveEquipment
This class represent offensive equipment that can be given to a character
PersonnageHorsPlateauException
This exception handles the case where a character passes the last square of the board on their last die roll
Potion
This class is the defensive equipment dedicated to the magician
Shield
This class is the defensive equipment dedicated to the warrior
Spell
This class is the offensive equipment dedicated to the magician
TextAreaHandler
This class is the handler for the graphic version
Warrior
This class represents a specific character that the player can choose to play with.
Weapon
This class is the offensive equipment dedicated to the warrior
Wizard
represents a wizard that can be encountered on the board
WrongEquipmentException
This exception prevents a character from equipping an item they are not allowed to.
